00017 package com.uperto.smartmenu;
00018 
00019 import android.app.Activity;
00020 import android.gesture.GestureLibraries;
00021 import android.gesture.GestureLibrary;
00022 import android.graphics.Bitmap;
00023 import android.graphics.BitmapFactory;
00024 import android.graphics.Color;
00025 import android.graphics.Paint;
00026 import android.os.Bundle;
00027 import android.view.MotionEvent;
00028 import android.view.View;
00029 import android.widget.Button;
00030 import android.widget.TextView;
00031 
00032 public class SmartMenuActivity extends Activity {
00033         private GestureLibrary  mLibrary;
00034         private TextView                mText;
00035         private Button                  mButton1;
00036         private Button                  mButton2;
00037         
00038         // Which option is active
00039         private boolean mChangedBackgroundColor = false;
00040         private boolean mChangedPainterColor = false;
00041         private boolean mChangedPainterStrokeWidth = false;
00042         private boolean mChangedHaloCenterColor = false;
00043         private boolean mChangedHaloOutsideColor = false;
00044         private boolean mChangedHaloGradient = false;
00045         private boolean mChangedHaloRadius = false;
00046         
00048     @Override
00049     public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
00050         super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
00051         
00052         setContentView(R.layout.main);
00053         
00054         // Init the gesture library
00055         mLibrary = GestureLibraries.fromRawResource(this, R.raw.gestures);
00056         if (!mLibrary.load()) {
00057                 finish();
00058         }
00059         
00060         mText = (TextView) findViewById(R.id.text);
00061         mButton1 = (Button) findViewById(R.id.button1);
00062         mButton2 = (Button) findViewById(R.id.button2);
00063         
00064         // Init the buttons
00065         mButton1.setOnTouchListener(new View.OnTouchListener() {
00066                         @Override
00067                         public boolean onTouch(View v, MotionEvent event) {
00068                                 mText.setText("I did things");
00069                                 return false;
00070                         }
00071         });
00072         
00073         mButton2.setOnTouchListener(new View.OnTouchListener() {
00074                         @Override
00075                         public boolean onTouch(View v, MotionEvent event) {
00076                                 mText.setText("I did other things");
00077                                 return false;
00078                         }
00079         });
00080         
00081         // Init the SmartMenu with our gesture library
00082         final SmartMenuOverlayView smartMenu = (SmartMenuOverlayView) findViewById(R.id.gestures);
00083         smartMenu.setGestureLibrary(mLibrary);
00084         
00085         final Paint painter = smartMenu.getPainter();
00086         
00087         // Add items to the menu
00088         Bitmap bmp = BitmapFactory.decodeResource(getResources(), R.drawable.icon1);
00089         smartMenu.addMenuItem(new SmartMenuOverlayView.SmartMenuItem("Background", bmp) {
00090                 public boolean onItemSelected() {
00091                         if (mChangedBackgroundColor) {
00092                                 smartMenu.setBackgroundColor(Color.argb(200, 0, 0, 0));
00093                                 mChangedBackgroundColor = false;
00094                         } else {
00095                                 smartMenu.setBackgroundColor(Color.argb(200, 255, 0, 0));
00096                                 mChangedBackgroundColor = true;
00097                         }
00098                                 return true;
00099                 }
00100         });
00101         
00102         bmp = BitmapFactory.decodeResource(getResources(), R.drawable.icon2);
00103         smartMenu.addMenuItem(new SmartMenuOverlayView.SmartMenuItem("Painter color", bmp) {
00104                 public boolean onItemSelected() {
00105                         if (mChangedPainterColor) {
00106                                 painter.setColor(Color.WHITE);
00107                                 mChangedPainterColor = false;
00108                         } else {
00109                                 painter.setColor(Color.GREEN);
00110                                 mChangedPainterColor = true;
00111                         }
00112                                 return true;
00113                 }
00114         });
00115         
00116         bmp = BitmapFactory.decodeResource(getResources(), R.drawable.icon3);
00117         smartMenu.addMenuItem(new SmartMenuOverlayView.SmartMenuItem("Stroke width", bmp) {
00118                 public boolean onItemSelected() {
00119                         if (mChangedPainterStrokeWidth) {
00120                                 painter.setStrokeWidth(3);
00121                                 mChangedPainterStrokeWidth = false;
00122                         } else {
00123                                 painter.setStrokeWidth(1);
00124                                 mChangedPainterStrokeWidth = true;
00125                         }
00126                                 return true;
00127                 }
00128         });
00129         
00130         bmp = BitmapFactory.decodeResource(getResources(), R.drawable.icon4);
00131         smartMenu.addMenuItem(new SmartMenuOverlayView.SmartMenuItem("Halo center color", bmp) {
00132                 public boolean onItemSelected() {
00133                         if (mChangedHaloCenterColor) {
00134                                 smartMenu.setHaloCenterColor(Color.argb(100, 128, 128, 128));
00135                                 mChangedHaloCenterColor = false;
00136                         } else {
00137                                 smartMenu.setHaloCenterColor(Color.argb(100, 255, 0, 0));
00138                                 mChangedHaloCenterColor = true;
00139                         }
00140                                 return true;
00141                 }
00142         });
00143         
00144         bmp = BitmapFactory.decodeResource(getResources(), R.drawable.icon5);
00145         smartMenu.addMenuItem(new SmartMenuOverlayView.SmartMenuItem("Halo out color", bmp) {
00146                 public boolean onItemSelected() {
00147                         if (mChangedHaloOutsideColor) {
00148                                 smartMenu.setHaloOutsideColor(Color.argb(10, 255, 255, 255));
00149                                 mChangedHaloOutsideColor = false;
00150                         } else {
00151                                 smartMenu.setHaloOutsideColor(Color.argb(20, 0, 0, 255));
00152                                 mChangedHaloOutsideColor = true;
00153                         }
00154                                 return true;
00155                 }
00156         });
00157         
00158         bmp = BitmapFactory.decodeResource(getResources(), R.drawable.icon6);
00159         smartMenu.addMenuItem(new SmartMenuOverlayView.SmartMenuItem("Halo gradient", bmp) {
00160                 public boolean onItemSelected() {
00161                         if (mChangedHaloGradient) {
00162                                 smartMenu.setHaloGradient(15);
00163                                 mChangedHaloGradient = false;
00164                         } else {
00165                                 smartMenu.setHaloGradient(5);
00166                                 mChangedHaloGradient = true;
00167                         }
00168                                 return true;
00169                 }
00170         });
00171         
00172         bmp = BitmapFactory.decodeResource(getResources(), R.drawable.icon7);
00173         smartMenu.addMenuItem(new SmartMenuOverlayView.SmartMenuItem("Halo radius", bmp) {
00174                 public boolean onItemSelected() {
00175                         if (mChangedHaloRadius) {
00176                                 smartMenu.setHaloRadius(30);
00177                                 mChangedHaloRadius = false;
00178                         } else {
00179                                 smartMenu.setHaloRadius(60);
00180                                 mChangedHaloRadius = true;
00181                         }
00182                                 return true;
00183                 }
00184         });
00185         
00186         if (savedInstanceState != null && savedInstanceState.getBoolean("menuOpened")) {
00187                 smartMenu.open(false);
00188         }
00189     }
00190     
00191     @Override
00192     protected void onSaveInstanceState(Bundle outState) {
00193         super.onSaveInstanceState(outState);
00194         
00195         outState.putBoolean("menuOpened", true);
00196     }
00197 }
